nodes.text: This Kajain'sa'Nikto pilot worked for the Hutt crime lords on the planet Nal Hutta during the Clone Wars around 21 BBY.

After Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, disguised as bounty hunter Rako Hardeen, was left for dead on Nal Hutta by fellow prisoners Cad Bane and Moralo Eval, he was captured and brought to the Hutt Palace by a Hutt enforcer who tortured him for information about the two other escapees.

The Jedi deliberately gave the guard the information in exchange for being released and this pilot along with two other Kajain'sa'Nikto immediately set out in HH-87 starfighters to shoot down the prisoner's starship. After the ship was damaged, the Nikto informed the enforcer, who sent in reinforcements to capture the prisoners once the ship crashed.
